creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: text written in Chinese and possibly Arabic in various colors on different colors of brocaded and plain silk (grey, orange, yellow, rust, cream) with a wide weave; grey brocade with pair of dragons flanking Chinese characters at end of scroll; two red seals (one nearly completely faded away)
dimension:
176 3/8 x 12 13/16 in. (447.99 x 32.54 cm) (image)
204 1/4 x 13 in. (518.8 x 33.02 cm) (overall, without roller)
title: Edict
